column64: If the client is clearly upset, transfer immediately to either case manager or attorney. Customer service is #1. Do not argue with client.

column73: Transfer them to a team member depending the situation, Take their message, If the paralegal says she is busy and cannot take the call, take a message for them.
column74: Most situations. The case managers/paralegals should be the most knowledgeable on the case. If it is an intake or new client, it will go to the legal assistant. Property damage goes to Maria.
column75: Just ask name, reason for the call, and if they know the name of the person they need to speak to. If they are a new client or seem confused, just send to legal assistant to figure it out. This should be a seamless process, when in doubt, transfer to legal assistant.

column77: New potential clients are a priority. If it is a follow up call, transfer to legal assistant. Otherwise, make sure someone picks up.
